doc.title: AI Tools Finder - Epic Breakdown
doc.snippet: Story 1.1 establishes the foundational project setup. Use `create-next-app@latest` with TypeScript template, configure tsconfig.json with strict mode, set up Tailwind CSS, and add essential dev dependencies (ESLint, Prettier, TypeScript).

doc.title: AI Tools Finder - Architecture Document
doc.snippet: Use `create-next-app@latest ai-tools-finder --typescript --tailwind --app --no-src-dir --import-alias "@/*"`. Establishes Next.js 16 with App Router, TypeScript strict mode, Tailwind CSS, ESLint and Prettier configured, and project structure following Next.js conventions.

doc.title: Epic Technical Specification: Foundation & Infrastructure
doc.section: Workflows and Sequencing - Story 1.1: Project Setup
doc.snippet: Run `npx create-next-app@latest` with TypeScript template, configure `tsconfig.json` with strict mode, install and configure Tailwind CSS, set up ESLint and Prettier, initialize Git repository with `.gitignore`, and create project structure (`/app`, `/components`, `/lib`, `/types`).

doc.title: AI Tools Finder - Product Requirements Document
doc.snippet: Framework: Next.js 16 (App Router), Language: TypeScript, Styling: Tailwind CSS, Code Quality: ESLint, Prettier, Type Checking: TypeScript strict mode.

constraint.rule: Must use App Router (not Pages Router)
Must use TypeScript strict mode (no `any` types without explicit justification)
Must follow Next.js 16 conventions (no custom routing outside App Router)
Use `@/*` import alias for cleaner imports (e.g., `@/components/Button`)
Prettier formatting must be consistent (`npm run format:check`)

tests.standards: Testing standards for this story focus on verifying project setup and configuration. TypeScript compilation must pass without errors. ESLint must pass with no warnings or errors. Prettier formatting must be consistent across all files. Build process must complete successfully. Development server must start without errors. All project structure directories must exist and follow Next.js 16 conventions.

locations.location: No test files required for this story - verification is done through build and lint commands

test.idea: Verify Next.js 16 is installed by checking package.json version
Verify TypeScript strict mode is enabled in tsconfig.json
Run `npx tsc --noEmit` to verify TypeScript compilation passes
Verify import alias `@/*` works by testing an import statement
Verify Tailwind CSS is installed in package.json
Test Tailwind by adding a test class and verifying styles apply
Verify ESLint is installed and configured
Run `npm run lint` and verify no errors
Verify Prettier is installed and configured
Run `npm run format:check` and verify formatting is consistent
Verify initial commit can be created
